posts.body:

Its a placeholder measure put into place because a couple of boards got spammed.

>>a83fa70c-abd2-4a57-bce2-d46b3e324c0c
**the BO probably deleted his BO cert(and thus his privileges) ages ago**

>>a03a67f4-401e-490a-a618-2426825bf562
**fun fact, i called champ but gave up because of the "can't publish" error**
I'll call champ again soon. As in probably in 9 or so hours.

==ME CHAMP==
Haha benis **i should've expected this speed**

>>6027374a-d1d7-4e4e-91dd-337da4eb3dbc
Why would a champ fuck off after one hour haha

>>0a459d8d-2b87-4312-843a-6b8f19dde957
**i actually checked and none of that shit seems like it counts as porn, it reminds me of /hebe/ really**

>>f951dd4f-52ad-4c29-a910-e7bc87b5fc56
i'm not using a fresh install anyway, but i have a pretty big feeling that the porn thats visible is shitposted Asian shit.
Surely ass shots don't count as porn.**though imao no seeds the board make it hard to see if thats the entire case with all of them**

>>f951dd4f-52ad-4c29-a910-e7bc87b5fc56
>the more legitimate sounding board and /b/ got the actual stuff
As i expected.

>>11e74de9-e7ec-4ce4-b6eb-dedd966ce4e9
**I actually forgot that the blacklist was a thing for a bit, but lo and behold a board being used for its listed purpose**
**Also it links a diskike wew**
My desire to know if the pretty non-CP looking images are CP ain't large enough to go through all that effort; useful info though.
Considering the lack of blacklisting i'm quite sure i have my answer anyway. 

Either way it doesn't matter too much if there is cp currently there right now, it'd be retarded to keep it un-blacklisted if you don't want cp, its listed use would have be used in such an environment eventually anyway.

>>dc037cf8-4bf2-47cd-8fd6-da38919c7298
>What's a good Fire Emblem game to start with if you've never touched the series?
Pretty much any of the GBA games are good starting points; the telius stuff drags due to poor design decisions despite being the most "complete" of the games in terms of showing off features.
**i think radiant dawn actually does allow you to bypass the ass long animations post completion, so maybe thats the best start? it can't be hard to find a file for that**
Telius also has a bunch of stuff that flat out doesn't exist outside of it and i don't mean just setting things.

Genealogy/Three Houses both are way too detached from the rest of the series to count as a good starting point.
I think the DS/3DS remakes also suffer from the same issues.**especially echoes/gaiden**

Thracia is better when you understand the series better.

>>bd70ad2e-41ef-4454-b2d0-1c85f0734998
8 is piss easy even when you avoid blatantly broken elements like grinding and Seth.
7 has a massive mandatory tutorial and 6 is a mess of poor choices. They aren't exactly hugely great either.
None of them are really standout. I'd call 8 very mediocre actually.
8 was and still functions very well as a "babbys first FE", even if it was removed from its pedestal by awakening. 
GBA era is definitely not something i'd call a golden age. 

The DS and 3DS stuff does not work as a functional group despite the DS stuff clearly being the baseline for awakening.
Shadow Dragon is not a common choice for anyone, nor is it a particularly player catering one.
I would say its sequel is very much similar despite the avatar.**something like Kris isn't as retardedly broken when you don't have shit like pair-up and skills on the side**
**Conquest also kinda doesn't work for the category, while i've never played normal for it i'd probably guess that its actually less newbie friendly than most of the GBA games**

Judging by what you dislike you probably don't get how stuff like 4/5 are meant to be played; they aren't meant to be played fairly, they aren't made for people who don't use their tools to the fullest. 
**of course this could just be a matter of taste**

>>05385c2f-4a90-4d2d-847c-ed5eb1f26330
Genealogy isn't hard enough to force "good children" to be necessary; inheritance being a twist mechanic doesn't matter and while foresight allows steamrolling i'm not implying thats what it wants you to use.  
The game gives you the money generation to fix bad item distribution as well.
>Did any of you realize how to recruit Arya
Arya isn't hard in the slightest to figure out really, i did it first try because it was blatant as hell despite what you're trying to imply.
I didn't have any issues with recruitment and in terms of legendary weapons they aren't needed either.
>Oh, and dare we forget the forced unit death level?
No i have no idea what the fuck you mean actually.
Can't remember such a thing at all.

>The NES games are an abomination 
**i actually have beaten both**
Yeah they are clumsy low budget NES games, they are kinda cute but also have aged to a point of being kinda unplayable.
The fate of most semi complex NES games.

>>a030e754-c6d4-4841-bf0a-129cce1c4da8
Arena isn't exactly prone to killing characters if you understand when to pull out.
I didn't need to savescum arena more than the normal game because its equivalent to it. 

Yeah you sure do make back yourself up by trying to make "avoid a character to recruit her later" sound extremely hard when its the logical course of action with the information you are given.
**even if FE doesn't usually do those types of things** 
Its not very hard to slip Sigurd past her either.
>Chapter 10
**i misread what you said before, i thought you said before sigurds death haha, that makes a lot more sense**
Technically not a kill chapter, though it probably will be for non-prepared players.
Though Ishtar isn't really that hard to beat in one turn, it does require foresight.**beating Julius is just a meme**

Also i meant easy in terms of leniency, the game is made so you can handle dealing with the substitutes and such; its not exactly massively hard without trying to actively gimp the second gen. 
I had a fucked gen 2 and still didn't really find it extremely hard.
**The GBA games is when difficulties were added to FE, 4 doesn't have a hard mode**
